#summary This page contains useful links, such as to game animations.

= Game Animations =
== 2006: Aim High ==
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlADdmCAMB8 Aim High] involved picking up balls and shooting them into a high target or pushing them into a low target.

== 2009: Lunacy ==
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Np2deG_RWg0 Lunacy] involved picking up balls and shooting them into trailers attached to opposing robots.

== 2012: Rebound Rumble ==
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nzpoMzLMhcw Rebound Rumble] involves picking up balls and shooting them into targets at many levels.
